nodes.explanation: The neuron is looking for mentions of various attacks, conflicts, and military operations involving different countries and groups
terms related to violent actions and attacks on people or property
phrases related to significant historical events or incidents
phrases related to violent actions or crimes
phrases related to destructive or criminal activities
phrases related to destruction and criminal activities
phrases related to political controversy and conflict
mentions of attacks and conflicts involving different countries and groups
mentions related to attacks on the United States and its interests
mentions of criminal activities or incidents involving violence
terms related to attacks on Western and US interests
locations and actors involved in acts of violence or conflict
